channel.title: spacemacs on Leaning Hardy
channel.description: Recent content in spacemacs on Leaning Hardy

item.title: 学习 Spacemacs
item.description: 安装 下载，最新下载地址 http://ftpmirror.gnu.org/emacs/emacs-25.2.tar.xz 安装 1 2 3 4 sudo yum -y install libXpm-devel libjpeg-turbo-devel openjpeg-devel openjpeg2-devel turbojpeg-devel giflib-devel libtiff-devel gnutls-devel libxml2-devel GConf2-devel dbus-devel wxGTK-devel gtk3-devel ./configure make sudo make install 常用快捷键 vi normal r, R: r 修改当个字符，R 则会进入一种 overwrite 模式，可以
